title: Erica's Big Day
description: It’s the day Erica Greendale has dreamed of since she was a girl – her marriage to a handsome groom in the society wedding of the year. But former flame Gavin McClain has other plans for the beautiful bride. Teaming up with a jealous bridesmaid he devises an evil blackmail plan which threatens to come to fruition as the event unfolds. Which man will claim Erica body and soul – her husband or the dark and ruthless Gavin? Can she prevent her big day from spiralling into a sexy nightmare of illicit lust?
author: Jake Malden
